value.description: The standard cyberarm is an aluminum and steel basket framework, with artificial plasteel muscles controlling motion. It is attached at the shoulder using a metal and plasteel cuff.
The standard cyberleg is an aluminum and steel basket framework, with artificial plasteel muscles controlling motion. It is attached at the pelvis using a metal and plasteel cuff.
This cyberoptic gives the recipient ultra high resolution graphics capability to enhance and refine images viewed.
